<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Embed Aeon Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=3021) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Downtime" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=49" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 240 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runelord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=103)

**Prerequisites**
[Runelord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3020); Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You discover the secrets to embedding [_aeon stones_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=407) into your flesh. You spend 1 day attuning to an _aeon stone_ and physically embedding it in your skin. While the stone is embedded this way, you gain the benefits of the _aeon stone_ as if it were orbiting above your head, but it protects the stone from being noticed or stolen as easily. _Aeon stones_ in your flesh must be invested to function, as usual.

 You can also use this activity to safely remove an embedded _aeon stone_ in 1 day. Someone without this feat can attempt to surgically remove it safely by spending 1 day and succeeding at a DC 30 [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check, or hastily by simply ripping it from a corpse.

<title level="2">Embed Aeon Stone leads to...</title>
[Aeon Resonance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3022)
name: Embed Aeon Stone
